property.name: Flavor
property.value: Eyeballs that portend unpleasant futures become slimy snacks instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from Humans Pay 1 life, Sacrifice another creature: Put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature and draw a card. {B}{B}, Discard a card: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Alpine Guide enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Mountain card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Alpine Guide attacks each combat if able. When Alpine Guide leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a Mountain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Aria of Flame enters the battlefield, each opponent gains 10 life. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a verse counter on Aria of Flame, then it deals damage equal to the number of verse counters on it to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hellbent - As long as you have no cards in hand, Sliver creatures you control have "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slivers can turn a last stand into a stunning victory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice another creature: Until end of turn, Bogardan Dragonheart becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 4/4, flying, and haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A hunger to soar must be sated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it wriggled closer to a thrum of slivers, their talons hardened and glinted in the sun. One took a playful swipe at a tree trunk, and its new blade cut clean through.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Firebolt deals 2 damage to any target. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw a card. Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +1/+0 for each card you've drawn this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire has always been my most faithful companion." - Jared Carthalion

property.name: Rules
property.value: If it's not your turn, you may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Create two 3/1 red Elemental creature tokens with trample and haste. Sacrifice those tokens at the beginning of your next upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Telepathy changes minds, necromancy changes lives, but geomancy changes the world.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If that creature is a Goat, it also gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stories of his heroics are inspiring, though none of them are remotely true.

property.value: When Goblin Engineer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle. {R}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Return target artifact card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.value: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A mother only a child could love.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was difficult to tell whether the piles of gore within their warrens were mere trash heaps, sacred altars, or warnings." - Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV
